#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Get Organized
#Text=over the Summer
#Text=The summer is a great time of the year to become organized .
#Text=Becoming organized may be easier said than done , but this article should help you to organize your lifestyle in an easy way .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Decide what needs to be organized .
#Text=Take a couple of days to create a big list of things you need to become more organized at .
#Text=Ask your family members and friends for some tips on what to put on this list so you can have absolutely everything written down .
#Text=If you ca n't think of everything right away , go ahead and take a couple of hours for a break .
#Text=When you come back to the list after having a break , you will probably find yourself capable of listing new ways of organizing .
#Text=Keep in mind that if your handwriting is very sloppy or hard to read , you may go ahead and type the list on a computer if you have the access to one .
#Text=Organize the small things first .
#Text=Do you need to help your children organize their toys ?
#Text=Try to do things similar to that concept first .
#Text=These should be the easy things on your list that only take a small amount of time to accomplish .
#Text=If the task will take over five hours to do , try to do that task later on in the summer .
#Text=Move on to the big tasks .
#Text=After all of the small tasks have been completed , it is time to move on to bigger tasks .
#Text=These tasks will definitely take up more time , and if you can only accomplish one task a day , that is fine .
#Text=Your goal should be to try to accomplish at least five big tasks a week until you are finished .
#Text=Do a major cleaning of your house .
#Text=Go through all of your drawers , closets , etc. to make sure you are positive of where everything is .
#Text=Donate the things you do n't need or use anymore .
#Text=Try to avoid putting random objects that do n't belong together in one area , as this will be confusing when you are looking for something .
#Text=Instead , try categorizing all of the items into separate containers based on what they do .
#Text=For example , keep all of your cleaning supplies ( broom , dust pans , etc. ) in one closet of your house .
#Text=Have your schedule figured out .
#Text=Besides doing the organizing of your home , you will also need to organize your life on a daily basis .
#Text=Try not to plan too far ahead when doing this , though , for you probably do not know what events will be occurring in the winter .
#Text=Instead , plan your schedule week by week in a planner or on a calendar .
#Text=Make sure to write down where the event will be taking place , the time of the event , what days the events are on , and other important information .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Do n't worry about rushing this process .
#Text=If you decide to hurry through everything , you will regret it when things are still a mess later on .
